## utils package

Contains helper methods for Veramo plugins.

## Functions

| Function                                                                                  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [asArray(arg)](./utils.asarray.md)                                                        | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Ensures that a given input is an array. If the input is a single item, it is converted to an array with a single entry.                                                                                                                                            |
| [base58ToBytes(s)](./utils.base58tobytes.md)                                              | Converts a base58 string to the Uint8Array it represents.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [base64ToBytes(s)](./utils.base64tobytes.md)                                              | Converts a base64url string to the Uint8Array it represents.                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [bytesToBase58(byteArray)](./utils.bytestobase58.md)                                      | Converts a base58 string to the Uint8Array it represents.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [bytesToBase64(b)](./utils.bytestobase64.md)                                              | Encodes a Uint8Array to a base64 string representation with padding.                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [bytesToBase64url(b)](./utils.bytestobase64url.md)                                        | Converts a Uint8Array to a base64url string                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [bytesToHex(byteArray, prefix)](./utils.bytestohex.md)                                    | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts a Uint8Array input to a hex string                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [compressIdentifierSecp256k1Keys(identifier)](./utils.compressidentifiersecp256k1keys.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts any Secp256k1 public keys of an to their compressed form.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [computeEntryHash(input)](./utils.computeentryhash.md)                                    | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Computes a hash for a given credential or presentation. This hash is usable as an internal ID for database indexing                                                                                                                                                |
| [convertIdentifierEncryptionKeys(identifier)](./utils.convertidentifierencryptionkeys.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts any Ed25519 keys of an to X25519 to be usable for encryption.                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [decodeBase64url(s)](./utils.decodebase64url.md)                                          | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Decodes a base64url string to a utf8 string represented by the same bytes.                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [decodeCredentialToObject(input)](./utils.decodecredentialtoobject.md)                    | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Parses a and converts it to a so it is easier to use programmatically.                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [decodeJoseBlob(blob)](./utils.decodejoseblob.md)                                         | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Decodes a base64url string representing stringified JSON to a JSON object.                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [decodePresentationToObject(input)](./utils.decodepresentationtoobject.md)                | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Parses a and converts it to a so it is easier to use programmatically.                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [dereferenceDidKeys(didDocument, section, context)](./utils.dereferencedidkeys.md)        | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Dereferences keys from DID document and normalizes them for easy comparison.</p><p>When dereferencing keyAgreement keys, only Ed25519 and X25519 curves are supported. Other key types are omitted from the result and Ed25519 keys are converted to X25519</p> |
| [encodeBase64url(s)](./utils.encodebase64url.md)                                          | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Encodes the bytes of an input string to base64url                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [encodeJoseBlob(payload)](./utils.encodejoseblob.md)                                      | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Stringifies a JSON object and encodes the bytes of the resulting string to a base64url representation.                                                                                                                                                             |
| [extractIssuer(input)](./utils.extractissuer.md)                                          | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Decodes a credential or presentation and returns the issuer ID <code>iss</code> from a JWT or <code>issuer</code>/<code>issuer.id</code> from a VC or <code>holder</code> from a VP                                                                                |
| [extractPublicKeyHex(pk, convert)](./utils.extractpublickeyhex.md)                        | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts the publicKey of a VerificationMethod to hex encoding (publicKeyHex)                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [getChainIdForDidEthr(verificationMethod)](./utils.getchainidfordidethr.md)               | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Extracts the chain ID from a supporting legacy representations as well.                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getEthereumAddress(verificationMethod)](./utils.getethereumaddress.md)                   | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Extracts an ethereum address from a supporting legacy representations.                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [hexToBytes(hexString)](./utils.hextobytes.md)                                            | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts a hex string (with or without prefix) to a byte array (Uint8Array)                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [isDefined(arg)](./utils.isdefined.md)                                                    | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Checks if a variable is defined and not null. After this check, typescript sees the variable as defined.                                                                                                                                                           |
| [isIterable(obj)](./utils.isiterable.md)                                                  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Checks if an object is iterable (can be used for <code>for..of</code>)                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [mapIdentifierKeysToDoc(identifier, section, context)](./utils.mapidentifierkeystodoc.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Maps the keys of a locally managed to the corresponding entries from the DID document.                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [processEntryToArray(inputEntryOrArray, startWithEntry)](./utils.processentrytoarray.md)  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Processes an entry or an array of entries into an array of entries. If a <code>startWithEntry</code> param is provided, it is set as the first item in the result array.                                                                                           |
| [resolveDidOrThrow(didUrl, context)](./utils.resolvedidorthrow.md)                        | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Resolve a DID document or throw an error if the resolution fails.                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

## Variables

| Variable                                                                | Description                                                                   |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [MANDATORY_CREDENTIAL_CONTEXT](./utils.mandatory_credential_context.md) | Every Verifiable Credential <code>@context</code> property must contain this. |

## Type Aliases

| Type Alias                          | Description                                                                                                                                                    |
| ----------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [RecordLike](./utils.recordlike.md) | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> A mapping of string to another type. Both Map and Record are accepted.</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p> |
